segments.text: I see a woman standing by the sink, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely unaware of the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the children behind her, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, which looks very unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of anxiety, hoping he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should be more attentive to what's going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene feels tense, like an accident is about to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why she doesn't hear the water or see the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit frustrating to watch, knowing something could go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
